page.title: 18A Schoolday in Rugeley
page.content: School starts at 08.55, and ends at 15.15 for Infants, 15.45 for Juniors. The {school day} is divided into 4 working sessions. 2 are in the morning and 2 after dinner. Between each session is a break. The hardest work is usually in the morning, following Assembly. Often it includes Mathematics and some form of English work. In the afternoon we may have work like Science, History, Geography, Environmental Science, Games, Art and Craft, and Religious Education. The {school timetable} has to be balanced evenly between all the different subjects, and arranged so that no two classes are using the Television room or Hall together. {After school} there are several clubs to choose from, such as Dancing, Drama, Football, Athletics, and Netball.
